Class CoreUtilities

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.CoreUtilities

public class CoreUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

The CoreUtilities class holds some usefule utility methods.

public static Code checkCreateCode(java.lang.String sName,
                                   IModel oModel,
                                   PCSession oSession,
                                   java.lang.String sAuthor)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Check if the code with the given name exists, and if node create.

Parameters:
sName, - the code text to check.
oModel, - the current model.
oSession, - the current session.
sAuthor, - the current author.
Returns:
Code, the code found/created.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

deleteFile

public static boolean deleteFile(java.io.File oFile)
Delete the given file. If cannot delete now, set ot delete on Exit, and record the file path in a specific system file, to be deleted on starting Compendium.

Parameters:
File - oDirectory, the directory to delete.
Returns:
true if directory exists, and delete done or set to do on exit, else false.

deleteDirectory

public static boolean deleteDirectory(java.io.File oDirectory)
Delete the given directory and all its contents. If cannot delete now, set ot delete on Exit, and record the file path in a specific system file, to be deleted on starting Compendium.

Parameters:
File - oDirectory, the directory to delete.
Returns:
true if directory exists, and delete done or set to do on exit, else false.

writeToDeleted

public static void writeToDeleted(java.lang.String path)
Write the given file path out to the file holding a list of files / directories to be deleted

Parameters:
String - path, the string to write to the file.

checkFilesToDeleted

public static void checkFilesToDeleted()
Check for files / directories to be deleted. If they have not been, try again.

sortList

public static java.util.Vector sortList(java.util.Vector unsortedVector)
Sort the given Vector of objects, depending on the object type. Types accepted are: String, JLabel, NodeSummary, Code, Vector (elementAt 1 = String), DefaultMutableTreeNode (where the user object is a Code, or a Vector with elementAt 1 = String).

Parameters:
Vector - unsortedVector, the vector of Objects to sort.
Returns:
Vector, or sorted objects.

sortList

public static java.util.Vector sortList(java.util.Vector unsortedVector,
                                        int criteria)
Sort the given Vector of Objects, depending on the Object type. Types accepted are: String, NodeSummary, Code. If the Vector contains NodeSummary objects, then sort by the passed criteria. The criteria can be: CoreUtilities.LABEL, CoreUtilities.CREATION_DATE, CoreUtilities.MODIFICATION_DATE.

Parameters:
Vector - unsortedVector, the vector of Objects to sort.
int - criteria, one of: CoreUtilities.LABEL, CoreUtilities.CREATION_DATE, CoreUtilities.MODIFICATION_DATE.
Returns:
Vector, or sorted objects.

private static int compare(double r1,
                           double r2)

public static double divide(double first,
                            double second)
Divide the first parameter by the second parameter

Parameters:
double - first, the number to divide into.
double - second, the number to divide by
Returns:
double, the result from dividing the first number by the second number.
